channel.title: Portal Troubles
channel.description:
Hey guys I've been having some trouble making portals teleport you.
I have tried this for my portals -
[code]case 4156: if (objectX == 1977 && objectY == 5007) teleportToX = 1978; teleportToY = 5008; break;[/code]
I have also tried with out the objectX and objectY. When I try without the objectX and Y it just doesn't teleport you. When I try it with the X and Y I get this error:
[code]client.java:6154: cannot find symbol symbol : variable objectX location: class client if (objectX == 1977 && objectY == 5007) ^ client.java:6154: cannot find symbol symbol : variable objectY location: class client if (objectX == 1977 && objectY == 5007) ^ Note: stream.java uses or overrides a deprecated API. Note: Recompile with -Xlint:deprecation for details. 2 errors Finished! Press any key to continue . . . [/code]
I am using wL source (Winter Love) if that helps any.
At first that wasn't the error I was getting. The first error was that objectX and objectY weren't initialized.
If you think you might be able to help let me know.

item.title: Portal Troubles
item.dc:creator: @waffle1 waffle`
item.description:
@waffle1 wrote:

I did that, doesn’t work. When I make that it fixes errors but it won’t teleport you. I’m nub so I don’t know why.

Read full topic

item.description:
@tonypker13 wrote:

still, I think he can get it from there

Read full topic

item.title: Portal Troubles
item.dc:creator: @Jordiescape Jordiescape
item.description:
@Jordiescape wrote:

Not exactly fixed as it doesn’t do the same as the piece of code he provided, but it does fix the errors.

Read full topic

item.title: Portal Troubles
item.dc:creator: @tonypker13 tonypker13
item.description:
@tonypker13 wrote:

Fixed:

         case 2465:
                teleportToX = 1978;
                teleportToY = 5008;
            break;

Read full topic

Alrighty, have a safe trip home.

item.title: Portal Troubles
item.dc:creator: @waffle1 waffle`
item.description:
@waffle1 wrote:

Hey guys I’ve been having some trouble making portals teleport you.

I have tried this for my portals -

case 4156: if (objectX == 1977 && objectY == 5007) teleportToX = 1978; teleportToY = 5008; break;

I have also tried with out the objectX and objectY. When I try without the objectX and Y it just doesn’t teleport you. When I try it with the X and Y I get this error:

client.java:6154: cannot find symbol symbol : variable objectX location: class client if (objectX == 1977 && objectY == 5007) ^ client.java:6154: cannot find symbol symbol : variable objectY location: class client if (objectX == 1977 && objectY == 5007) ^ Note: stream.java uses or overrides a deprecated API. Note: Recompile with -Xlint:deprecation for details. 2 errors Finished! Press any key to continue . . .

I am using wL source (Winter Love) if that helps any.

At first that wasn’t the error I was getting. The first error was that objectX and objectY weren’t initialized.

If you think you might be able to help let me know.

Read full topic
